dfischer.proxysniffer

Class ProxySnifferVarSourceTextfile

  • java.lang.Object
    • dfischer.proxysniffer.ProxySnifferVarSourceDataInstance
      • dfischer.proxysniffer.ProxySnifferVarSourceTextfile

  • public class ProxySnifferVarSourceTextfile
extends ProxySnifferVarSourceDataInstance
    Var source for an "Input File".

    • Constructor Detail

      • ProxySnifferVarSourceTextfile

        public ProxySnifferVarSourceTextfile()
        Object transfer constructor.

      • ProxySnifferVarSourceTextfile

        public ProxySnifferVarSourceTextfile(java.lang.String fileName,
                             int fileScope,
                             int lineOrder,
                             java.lang.String commentTag,
                             java.lang.String varDelimiter,
                             boolean trimExtractedVars,
                             int eofAction)
        Create a new, initialized instance. Note when you define an input file with a scope of inner loop you must call also setInnerLoopUniqueKey(String innerLoopUniqueKey). Also when you define an input file with a scope of URL loop you must call also setUrlLoopUniqueKey(String urlLoopUniqueKey)
        Parameters:
        fileName - the name of the input file - must suffer isValidFileName(String) - not checked here.
        fileScope - the scope of the file (global, user, loop or inner loop)
        lineOrder - sequential or randomized
        commentTag - the line comment tag, or null if no line comment tag is needed
        varDelimiter - the delimiter between the values of a line
        trimExtractedVars - true = trim the values of the variables
        eofAction - "reopen file" or "stop load test" when the end of the file is reached
        See Also:
        isValidFileName(String), ProxySnifferVar.SCOPE_GLOBAL, ProxySnifferVar.SCOPE_USER, ProxySnifferVar.SCOPE_LOOP, ProxySnifferVar.SCOPE_INNER_LOOP, ProxySnifferVar.SCOPE_URL_LOOP, LINE_ORDER_SEQUENTIAL, LINE_ORDER_RANDOMIZED, EOF_REOPEN_FILE, EOF_STOP_LOAD_TEST, setInnerLoopUniqueKey(String)

      • ProxySnifferVarSourceTextfile

        public ProxySnifferVarSourceTextfile(java.lang.String fileName,
                             int fileScope,
                             int lineOrder,
                             java.lang.String commentTag,
                             java.lang.String varDelimiter,
                             int eofAction)
        Deprecated. Old constructor (before V4.1-C).

        public void setInnerLoopUniqueKey(java.lang.String innerLoopUniqueKey)

        See Also:
